SELECT menu_no, menu_name, menu_link, menu_icon, menu_level FROM Menu WHERE use_flag = 'Y'
AND menu_level = #{level}
SELECT menu_sub_name, menu_no, menu_link FROM Menu_sub WHERE use_flag = 'Y'
SELECT book_no, book_url, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_isbn, book_sug FROM Book WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_sug = 'Y'

SELECT count(*) FROM Book WHERE use_flag = 'Y'
AND book_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')

SELECT book_no, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_category_no, book_category_name, book_pub_year, book_url, book_isbn, date_format(reg_date, '%Y.%m.%d') as reg_date FROM Book WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_isbn = #{isbn}
SELECT count(*) FROM Book WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_category_name = #{menuName}

SELECT book_no, book_title, book_author, book_publisher, book_category_no, book_category_name, book_pub_year, book_isbn, book_url FROM Book WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_category_name = #{menuName} limit #{currentPage}, #{recordPage}
SELECT noti_no, noti_title, date_format(mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as mod_date FROM notification WHERE use_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY reg_date DESC limit 5

SELECT ply.bpl_no, ply.bpl_name, ply.bpl_intro, ply.bpl_category, ply.book_cnt, (SELECT bpl.book_no FROM bpl_detail AS bpl WHERE bpl.bpl_no = ply.bpl_no and bpl.use_flag = 'Y' LIMIT 1) AS book_no, (SELECT book.book_url FROM bpl_detail AS bpl JOIN book ON bpl.book_no = book.book_no WHERE bpl.bpl_no = ply.bpl_no AND bpl.use_flag = 'Y' LIMIT 1) AS book_url, (SELECT prefer.pf_name FROM bpl_detail AS bpl JOIN prefer ON prefer.pf_no = ply.bpl_category WHERE bpl.bpl_no = ply.bpl_no AND bpl.use_flag = 'Y' LIMIT 1) AS pf_name FROM book_playlist AS ply WHERE ply.use_flag = 'Y' AND ply.bpl_category = #{favorite};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_basket(mem_no, book_no, reg_date, mod_date) VALUES (#{memNo}, #{bookNo}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT basket.book_no, book.book_title, book.book_author, book.book_publisher, book.book_category_no, book.book_category_name, book.book_url FROM book_basket as basket JOIN book ON book.book_no = basket.book_no WHERE basket.use_flag = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM rent WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_no = #{bookNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE rent SET return_state = "연체중" WHERE return_date is null AND date_add(rent_date, INTERVAL 14 DAY) < now()

SELECT rent.rent_date, member.mem_email, member.mem_name FROM rent JOIN member ON member.mem_no = rent.mem_no WHERE return_date is null AND date_add(rent.rent_date, INTERVAL 14 DAY) < now()

SELECT COUNT(reserv.book_no), reserv.book_no, book.book_title, book.book_publisher, book.book_category_no, book.book_category_name, book.book_url, book.book_isbn FROM (SELECT * FROM book_reservation WHERE use_flag = 'Y' ORDER BY reserv_date DESC LIMIT 100) AS reserv JOIN book ON reserv.book_no = book.book_no GROUP BY reserv.book_no limit 5;
SELECT rent_no, rev_scope, rev_content, mem_no FROM review WHERE use_flag = 'Y' AND book_no = (select book_no from book where book_isbn = #{isbn});
